name: Angband
overview: Angband is a member of the roguelike RPGs. The goal of the game is to descend in the dungeons and become powerful enough to defeat the evil Morgoth at the bottom of the dungeon. Angband is an updated version of the game Moria, adding more monsters, character races and classes; deepening the dungeon from 50 levels to 100; and including such new features as monster pits and unique items.
